bibl.title: A Peripatetic Dialogue in P.Oxy. LIII 3699: A New Edition Based on New Joins.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: P. Oxy. LIII, 3699 (= M.-P.3 2592.61; LDAB 4859). - Proposes new joins between fragments published as separate pieces in the editio princeps. - 1. Introduction. - 2. The order of the pieces. - 3. Description of the papyrus. - 4. Authorship [Theophrastus would be a likely candidate]. - 5. Edition. - 6. Commentary. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Gertjan Verhasselt, A Peripatetic Dialogue in P.Oxy. LIII 3699: A New Edition Based on New Joins.
ArchPF 61 (2015) pp. 5-31, 1 tabl., 3 pll. dont 1 coul.

P. Oxy. LIII, 3699 (= M.-P.3 2592.61; LDAB 4859). - Proposes new joins between fragments published as separate pieces in the editio princeps. - 1. Introduction. - 2. The order of the pieces. - 3. Description of the papyrus. - 4. Authorship [Theophrastus would be a likely candidate]. - 5. Edition. - 6. Commentary. - Avec résumé en anglais.
